Name: Black Nail #1
Ingredients: 15 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A suitably hardened Rusty Nail variation with a full three measures of spirit.
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England and named after New Zealand's All Blacks rugby team.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Nail #1 contains 210 calories
